CoreProduct.ProductDescription:
Rewards are our way of giving you something back. This account is for our Premier Banking customers.

Earn 2% back in Rewards when you pay 7 types of household bills by Direct Debit.

FeatureBenefitEligibility.Name: Minimum Credit Turnover
FeatureBenefitEligibility.Description:
To keep earning Rewards on eligible household bills, remember to pay a minimum of £1,500 into any personal current account(s) you have with us (as long as it’s not a Foundation, Basic or mortgage current account) every calendar month.  

The £1,500 minimum can’t be transferred from another Royal Bank or NatWest current account or savings account that you hold with us.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription:
Student life is tough enough as it is, so we’re doing our bit to help;

- 1/3 coach travel in UK and National Express

- Interest free overdraft up to £2,000 (£500 in first term)

- Easy-to-use Mobile Banking app

OtherEligibility.Name: Graduate Eligibility
OtherEligibility.Textual:
To apply, you must be a permanent UK resident only. You must have graduated from a full-time course or higher education (lasting 2 years or more) within the last 3 years. 

This also includes if you have completed training as a nurse. 

You are also eligible if you have previously held a NatWest Student bank account.
Notes:

Foreign Cheques paid in - By Collection:
A fee of 0.25% of the payment value. (minimum of £20, maximum of £70), plus any agents' charges.

There is also a postage fee of £3.30 within Europe and £3.60 for the rest of the world.  

For cheques sent to other banks in the UK, there is a flat charge of £12 per item, plus any agents' charges.

Foreign Cheques paid in - By Negotiation:
A fee of 0.25% of the payment value. 
(minimum of £7, maximum of £45)
There is also a 50p postage fee.

OtherType.Name: RegularFee
OtherType.Description: States the frequency of the fee for using the product.

OtherType.Name: SetOffArrangement
OtherType.Description: Set-off against other debt product.

OtherType.Name: ChequeBookAvailable
OtherType.Description: States if a cheque book comes with the product.

OtherType.Name: CreditInterestRatePayable
OtherType.Description: This defines whether a credit interest is payable on the account.

OtherType.Name: Currency
OtherType.Description: A system of money, in any form, that can be used as a unit of account, medium of exchange and store of value.

OtherType.Name: CurrentAccountSwitchService
OtherType.Description: States if the product can be used with the current account switch service.

OtherType.Name: DebitCard
OtherType.Description: States if the product is offered with a debit card.

OtherType.Name: DirectDebits
OtherType.Description: This allows the customer to set up direct debits on the account.

OtherType.Name: ElectronicPayments
OtherType.Description: States whether the product is in the form of an electronic payment, i.e. making payments over an electronic system.

OtherType.Name: InstantAccess
OtherType.Description: States if the product allows the customer to have instant access to their funds.

OtherType.Name: JointAccountAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if the product can be offered on a joint account basis.

OtherType.Name: NegotiableTariffOptions
OtherType.Description: Can the fees and components of the tariff be negotiated?

OtherType.Name: PaymentClearingSystemSupported
OtherType.Description: The payment systems supported by the product.

OtherType.Name: QuickDepositsServiceAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if 'quick deposits' are available with the product.

OtherType.Name: StandingOrderAvailability
OtherType.Description: States if standing orders can be used with this product.

OtherType.Name: TransfersAllowed
OtherType.Description: Between other types of account.

OtherType.Name: AutoTransfers
OtherType.Description: States if an automatic transfer can be created between accounts to ensure a minimum balance is maintained.
